Title: Study the Soviet Union, to advance to the level of world science
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The airplane pictured is a typical 1950s technological fantasy. It seems to be meant as a passenger plane, circling the earth outside of the atmosphere. The space race between the West and the East is in full swing in the late 1950s, with the East (the Soviet Union) in the lead. China is just starting its own satellite projects.This is a print from the second impression (August 1958).
Theme: Foreign Friends: Soviet UnionChinese Space Program
